name: mitch
description: Sugar for getting data out of strings.
author: Lim Yuan Qing

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover -- node_modules/.bin/minijasminenode2 test/*.spec.js --verbose
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js --debug --outfile dist/mitch.js --standalone mitch && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/mitch.js --output dist/mitch.min.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run dist
